amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1005 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1005 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To express the sense of Congress.
